message: Hello, I'd like to order 3 chicken alfredos and 1 pepperoni pizza

Great! I found Chicken Alfredo and Pepperoni on our menu for AED 35.0 each and AED 43.0 respectively. The total comes to AED 148.00. Would you like to place an order for these items? Please respond with 'yes' to confirm or 'no' to cancel.

If you confirm, I will then ask for your NYU ID (8 digits), valid building number (options: A1A, A1B, A1C, A2A, A2B, A2C, A3, A4, A5A, A5B, A5C, A6A, A6B, A6C), and phone number to proceed with your order.

Thank you for your order! I found Chicken Alfredo and Pepperoni on our menu for AED 35.0 each and AED 43.0 respectively. The total comes to AED 148.00. To finalize your order, please provide me with your NYU ID (8 digits), a valid building number (options: A1A, A1B, A1C, A2A, A2B, A2C, A3, A4, A5A, A5B, A5C, A6A, A6B, A6C), and your phone number. I look forward to serving you!
